articles.title: Combination Drug Therapy For COVID Treatment - WebMD
articles.description: A U.S. federally funded clinical trial is testing whether the experimental antiviral drug remdesivir works better against COVID-19 if given with a powerful anti-inflammatory drug called baricitinib.

articles.description: Stop worrying about those runners and cyclists without a mask, whom you scoff at as you walk outside. Biologist Erin Bromage, whose advice went viral, says to worry instead about the loud talkers in crowded indoor spaces.
